images.title: Friendly Elephant
images.description: A cute gray elephant with big ears and a friendly smile. The elephant has a long trunk and kind eyes.
conversationTopics: How do elephants use their trunks?

images.title: Sunny Garden
images.description: A beautiful garden scene with a bright yellow sun in a blue sky, green grass, and colorful flowers including pink, red, and purple blooms.
conversationTopics: What does the sun do for plants?
What do flowers need to grow?

images.title: Colorful Toy Train
images.description: A cheerful toy train with a red engine, blue windows, a smokestack, and a turquoise cargo car. The train has black wheels and runs on brown tracks.
conversationTopics: What color is the train engine?
What sound does a train make?
Have you ever been on a train?

images.title: Underwater Ocean Scene
images.description: An underwater ocean scene with blue water, colorful fish swimming (orange and pink), bubbles floating up, and green seaweed growing from the bottom.
conversationTopics: What animals live in the ocean?
Have you ever been to the ocean?

images.title: Rainbow in the Sky
images.description: A beautiful rainbow arching across a blue sky with white fluffy clouds and green grass below. The rainbow has all seven colors: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
conversationTopics: How many colors are in the rainbow?
